meta.name: keywords
meta.content: php, java, logging, tracing, component, framework, API, log4php

section.name: Project Status
section.p: Log4php is an effort undergoing incubation at the Apache Software Foundation (ASF), sponsored by the Apache Logging Services project. Incubation is required of all newly accepted projects until a further review indicates that the infrastructure, communications, and decision making process have stabilized in a manner consistent with other successful ASF projects. While incubation status is not necessarily a reflection of the completeness or stability of the code, it does indicate that the project has yet to be fully endorsed by the ASF.
